title: Ticket #6882: Fix DaemonCore reaper callback typedef
description:
The signature for a reaper callback is presently 

int (*reaper)( Service *, int pid, int exit_status );
// or
int (Service::*reaper)( int pid, int exit_status );

In neither case does DaemonCore look at, or even record, the reaper's return value; the return should therefore be void.

Additionally, in neither case is int the correct type for PIDs; we have a pid_t typedef and should use it.
